description: Styling for a React-based Tic Tac Toe game, including themes, layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container style for the application, sets text alignment and background color.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Style for the game container with padding, background, and shadow.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Layout for the game board, using a grid format.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Style for individual squares in the game board with hover effects.

classes.name: notification
classes.description: Style for notifications within the game.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Style for the reset button, including hover effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style for the application with responsive and transition effects.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo with animation.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button with hover and active states.
